backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles and marketplace-style listings with authorization checks, creation, filtering, and search.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping product features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing purposes of various frontend files across components, pages, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers and CSS variables for light/dark themes with a neon‑styled palette.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes and wraps the app with ThemeProvider, profile setup, and toast system.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button integrating Internet Identity with loading states and cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Auth guard that blocks access for unauthenticated users and shows a sign‑in required card.
frontend/src/components/images/ImageUrlF: Empty placeholder file for image URL form field components.
frontend/src/components/images/SafeImage: Empty placeholder file for a safe image rendering component.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppFooter: Footer displaying copyright, branding, and a caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Top navigation bar with logo, links, login button, and responsive mobile sheet menu.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines a page layout with header, footer, and routed content via Outlet.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Shows a dialog prompting new authenticated users to enter their name and saves the profile.
frontend/src/components/start/NeonStartS: Renders an animated neon space scene on a canvas with UFOs, cows, sparks, and a banner.
frontend/src/game/audio/useMusicTrack.ts: Hook that loads and controls looping background music with mute and play state handling.
frontend/src/game/audio/useSfx.ts: Hook providing throttled spatialized sound effects with caching and stereo panning.
frontend/src/game/constants.ts: Defines grid, speed, scoring, spawn intervals, and planet effect constants for the game.
frontend/src/game/hooks/useGameLoop.ts: Main game loop hook handling state updates, sprite loading, spawns, input, and rendering.
frontend/src/game/render/entities.ts: Rendering helpers for snakes and crocodiles using sprite sheets and glow effects.
frontend/src/game/render/obstacles.ts: Rendering functions for UFOs, cows, penguin bosses, and point drops with glow effects.
frontend/src/game/render/sprites.ts: Sprite manager for loading and drawing pixel-art sprites with smoothing disabled.
frontend/src/game/render/starfield.ts: Animated starfield renderer producing twinkling drifting stars for backgrounds.
frontend/src/game/render/vfx.ts: Implements canvas rendering for laser beams, explosion animations, and floating score popups with glow effects.
frontend/src/game/skins/catalog.ts: Defines snake skin metadata and exports a list of preset skins with names, descriptions, and colors.
frontend/src/game/types.ts: Contains shared game TypeScript types for snakes, power-ups, obstacles, bosses, VFX, and overall game state.
frontend/src/game/ui/ControlsHintOverlay: Renders a small UI overlay showing keyboard, touch, and mouse control hints.
frontend/src/game/ui/GameHUD.tsx: Displays score, level, eliminations, and planet/gravity badges using game state data.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Provides current user identity, profile, and authentication state by combining identity and profile queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity context, login handling, stored identity loading, and related React hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides react-query hooks for fetching and saving the caller's user profile using the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom neon-themed UI variables and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page showing a neon hero section, game intro, and feature cards with navigation to lobby and leaderboard.
frontend/src/pages/LeaderboardPage.tsx: Displays a mock leaderboard with ranked player stats and placeholders for future account-linked scores.
frontend/src/pages/ListingDetailsPage.ts: Empty placeholder page with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/LobbyPage.tsx: Provides UI for selecting local or multiplayer modes, creating or joining lobbies, and starting local games.
frontend/src/pages/MyListingsPage.tsx: Empty placeholder page with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/PlayPage.tsx: Runs the main game loop with canvas rendering, HUD, audio controls, and pause/play logic based on loaded sprites.
frontend/src/pages/SellListingPage.tsx: Empty placeholder page with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/SkinsPage.tsx: Displays snake skins with ownership and equip UI, using a catalog and placeholders for future backend integration.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and persisting URL parameters with sessionStorage and hash support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending fonts, colors, shadows, animations, and container settings with plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: JSON describing the Spacecoco project's current state, including game vision, architectural notes, required assets, and known issues.
